parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
The name of the performance metric. Separate multiple values with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **adbpg_datashare_topic_count**: the number of shared topics.
*   **adbpg_datashare_data_size_mb**: the amount of data shared.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
